summary: Completed frontend testing of Adventure Mode features. Main menu navigation works, but character creation has overlay issues preventing proper completion. Unable to reach the actual adventure world with witty names and Battle Ricky functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: Overlay interception prevents clicking on character creation buttons
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks access to adventure mode features

critical_bugs.issue: Character creation does not complete properly - redirects back to main menu
critical_bugs.impact: Cannot access adventure world with witty names and Battle Ricky features

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks interaction with form elements

integration_issues.issue: ENTER WORLD button leads to character creation but doesn't complete the flow to adventure world

passed_tests: ENTER WORLD button is clickable and navigates to Adventure Mode
Character creation screen displays with proper UI elements
Character creation steps progress through Gender, Background, Appearance, and Name sections
Frontend application loads without JavaScript errors
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix character creation overlay issues preventing button clicks. The modal overlay is intercepting pointer events, blocking interaction with gender selection and other form elements. Once fixed, verify that character creation completes properly and leads to the adventure world with Barnacle Bay Plaza, Battle Ricky button, and witty shop names.

success_percentage.frontend: 23% - Main menu and character creation UI work, but core adventure features are inaccessible due to character creation completion issues
success_percentage.backend: Not tested - frontend issues prevent reaching adventure mode
